name: Gateway of the Clouds
text:
Each time a "Cloudian" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned, place 2 Fog Counters on this card. You can remove Fog Counters from your field to activate these effects. 
 ● 2 Counters: Target 1 "Cloudian" Effect Monster; that target gains 500 ATK until the end of the turn. 
 ● 4 Counters: Add 1 "Cloudian" monster from your Deck or GY to your hand. 
 ● 6 Counters: Target 1 "Cloudian" Effect Monster in your GY; Special Summon that target.
